summary: Rapper/multi-millionaire P. Miller becomes the guardian of his sister's three children - all of whom need a father figure in their lives.
cast: Master P|Romeo Miller|Mercedeh Allen|TeeJay Boyce|Adam Cagley|Rachelle Clark|D.C. Cody|Tony Cox|Brendan Hill|Ken Jeong|Ella Joyce|Ivan Kraljevic|Hope Levy|J. Marc|Leilani Marie|Cheech Marin|Janora McDuffie|Candace McKinney|Dina Lynne Morishita|Mari Morrow|John Murphy Jr.|Radhaa Nilia|Alysia Joy Powell|Booboo Stewart|Nils Allen Stewart|Diana Terranova|Kevin L. Walker|Tracy Weisert
title: Uncle P
